divs: Sighting Details i was leaving the sams parking lot @ mesa st.near doniphan in el paso. in my convertible with the top down--i saw in the westsky toward the upper valley an object sort of like a bucket or cylinder(vertical) hanging in the sky and it glowed and appeared to have flames from thetop, i thought it might be a meteor or space junk. called my daughter oncellphone, and she went outside my house, about 5 miles away on the mountain,and she observed it moving from side to side. i lost sight of it when i turnedeast to drive home. my daughter quit watching it when she got bored--when iarrived home about 10 minutes later, it was gone.
Summary: saw a bucket-like object with apparent flames in s
